Node.definition: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which humans and animals have a certain age, ◄ referred to as a child of a certain number of years
= state in which a countable entity is six in number
= causative action by which humans or deities place (other) humans in a position of royal authority over a group of people

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= man; ◄ son of Joash (יֹואָשׁ) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= town, also known as Elath (אֵילַת) ◄ located at northern tip of north eastern projection of Red Sea; ► harbor|= town, also known as Eloth (אֵילֹות) ◄ located at northern tip of north eastern projection of Red Sea (יָם־סוּף) ► harbor
literally: to cause to return (to someone); hence: = causative action by which humans cause other humans to regain control over something

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed

Node.gloss: to lie down with one's fathers > to rest with one's ancestors
Node.definition: literally: to lie down with one's fathers; hence: = process by which a human being dies and so shares the fate and destination of his/her ancestors; ≈ only said of people in positions demanding respect, such as patriarchs and kings
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= indirect male progenitor
= state in which humans and animals have a certain age, ◄ referred to as a child of a certain number of years
= state in which a countable entity is six in number
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which an event is morally and ethically right

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= man; ◄ son of Joash (יֹואָשׁ) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= man; ► prophet (נָבִיא) time of Uzziah (עֻזִּיָּהוּ)

Node.gloss: to instruct|to give instruction|to teach|to give understanding|to explain
Node.definition: = pattern of actions by which someone helps others to gain knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to make successful|to give success|to make prosper
Node.definition: = causative action by which a deity assists or helps a human complete a task with the desired outcome
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)

Node.gloss: to break|to breach|to make breaches|to cut
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make one or more large holes in a wall, hedge, or in the ground; ► with the purpose of entering through those holes or of making the area within it vulnerable; ≈ to have a town with a breached wall is also regarded as a deep humiliation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
= town; ◄ located in Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) ► one of the fives cities of the Philistines (פְּלֶשֶׁת)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
= town, possibly to be identified with Jabneel (יַבְנְאֵל) ◄ located in territory of Philistines; ► conquered by king Uzziah

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
= town; ◄ located in Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) ► one of the fives cities of the Philistines (פְּלֶשֶׁת)
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= town; ◄ located in Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) ► one of the fives cities of the Philistines (פְּלֶשֶׁת)
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= inhabitant of Arabia (עֲרַב)
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= town; ◄ in Arab (עַרְבִי) territory; ► fought with Uzziah (עֻזִּיָּהוּ) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= inhabitants of Maon (מָעֹון)
= inhabitant of Ammon (עַמֹּון)

= objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple
= process by which events take place, ◄ as if they move like objects
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

Node.gloss: to be strong|to prevail|to overcome|to overpower
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words
= process by which an event gradually increases in intensity
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple
= relatively high structure made of stone; ► used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; ≈ associated with security and protection
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= name of gate of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם)
= a gate ◄ in Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) ► where towers were built in the time of king Uzziah (עֻזִּיָּהוּ)
= part of a construction where two sides come together

Node.gloss: to strengthen|to give strength, to fortify|to repair|to let prevail
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause humans and objects to be strong in a physical, political, or military sense
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= relatively high structure made of stone; ► used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; ≈ associated with security and protection
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

Node.gloss: to hew out|to dig|to cut out|to dress|to mine
Node.definition: = action by which humans strike an object repeatedly with an axe, chisel, or other sharp implement, ► in order to alter its shape and so create a new object out of it

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

literally: the lowland; = the area situated between the hill country (הַר) and the coastal plain, which consists of foothills; named thus by the Israelites who occupied the hill country; known for its olive trees (זַיִת) and sycamore trees (שִׁקְמָה)
= an elevated flat area east of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) located between the river Arnon (אַרְנֹון) in the south and Wadi Heshbon (חֶשְׁבֹּון) in the north
= person practicing agriculture as his profession
= farmer specialized in growing grapes
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= land that is suitable for agriculture ◄ as a result of fertility and sufficient rain
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
literally: to go out as army; = state in which men qualify for military service
= person who is fit for military service

= a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose it is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army
= the quantity of a number of objects or the frequency of a number of events
literally: by the hand (of someone); hence: = process by which a certain event is carried out by an intermediary (person) or instrument (object)
= man; ► secretary; time of Uzziah (עֻזִּיָּהוּ)

= a high ranking official, usually learned, who served in the king's court and was responsible for the king's official business ► held some authority in administrative and financial, and perhaps also military matters
= man; ► official; time of king Uzziah (עֻזִּיָּהוּ)
= person selected from among a group of people to assume a position of leadership and responsibility
literally: according to the hand(s) (of someone); hence: = state in which something takes place under the authority of someone else
= man; ► official; time of Uzziah (עֻזִּיָּהוּ)
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= the quantity of a number of objects or the frequency of a number of events
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is six in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
literally: according to the hand(s) (of someone); hence: = state in which something takes place under the authority of someone else

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an object to be firmly located in a certain place
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer
= head covering; ◄ made of metal; ► used by soldiers for protection
= a piece of armor covering the chest (and sometimes the back) from the neck to the waist; made of metal or thick leather reinforced with metal, to protect the body against blows and arrows
= a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible

= weapon consisting of two strings with a pouch (כַּף) in the middle;◄ made of leather; ► a stone (אֶבֶן) is placed in the pouch, the sling is twirled and one string released to propel the stone; used to hunt or to chase away wild animals, or to attack an enemy
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

literally: cleverly constructed object; hence: = construction consisting of several parts working together; ◄ probably made out of wood; ► used to assist human beings in activities that would otherwise be beyond their capacities
= procedure for the production of an artifact
= person who has made it his/her profession to create artifacts
= relatively high structure made of stone; ► used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; ≈ associated with security and protection
= causative action by which humans launch arrows (חֵץ) with the help of a bow (קֶשֶׁת)

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size

Node.gloss: to go out|to go forth|to be known
Node.definition: literally: to go out; hence: = process by which certain information is becoming publicly known
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= process by which humans receive assistance or supported from other humans or deities
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to be strong|to prevail|to overcome|to overpower
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words
= state in which humans are strong in political sense

Node.gloss: to be high of heart > to have an elevated mind
Node.definition: literally: (one's) heart is high; hence: = state in which humans have positive thoughts about themselves and their abilities, ≈ which can be either good or bad, depending on whether these thoughts are justified
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to commit a violation|to be unfaithful
Node.definition: = to do something that is not in line with the behavior that one has committed oneself to
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a reference to the main building of a temple, to be distinguished from the surrounding court and other constructions around it
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= substance ◄ made from tree gum or bark ► to make a sweet smell; it is burned in a censer or on an open fire ≈ to provide a sweet aroma pleasing to God
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ descendant of Zadok (צָדֹוק) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of kings Uzziah (עֻזִּיָּהוּ) Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is eighty in number
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) brother of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► first high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= causative action by where humans cause other humans or objects to be ready to be in the presence of a deity by going through special rituals
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= central part of sanctuary which is considered more holy than the rest and therefore accessible to priests only

Node.gloss: to commit a violation|to be unfaithful
Node.definition: = to do something that is not in line with the behavior that one has committed oneself to
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= process by which humans become exceedingly angry to the extent that it becomes visible in their appearance
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= container in which incense is burned
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity
= process by which humans become exceedingly angry to the extent that it becomes visible in their appearance
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= a condition that affects the skin or surface, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma, but also mildew on cloth and walls; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; clothes and buildings that are affected by it are unclean as well; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God
= process by which a certain condition becomes gradually visible, like the rising sun
= front part of the head; ≈ associated with stubbornness and lack of shame
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= substance ◄ made from tree gum or bark ► to make a sweet smell; it is burned in a censer or on an open fire ≈ to provide a sweet aroma pleasing to God
= man; ◄ descendant of Zadok (צָדֹוק) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of kings Uzziah (עֻזִּיָּהוּ) Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to suffer from a skin disease|to be affected by mildew
Node.definition: = state in which humans suffer from a condition that affects the skin, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God
= front part of the head; ≈ associated with stubbornness and lack of shame
= action by which humans cause someone else to move quickly from a certain location

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= process by which an action is performed with more urge and speed than usual

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
literally: to touch; hence: = causative action by which humans, deities or forces cause harm to humans or objects
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to suffer from a skin disease|to be affected by mildew
Node.definition: = state in which humans suffer from a condition that affects the skin, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= process by which humans or animals stop living
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

Node.gloss: to suffer from a skin disease|to be affected by mildew
Node.definition: = state in which humans suffer from a condition that affects the skin, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God
= causative action by which objects are forcefully removed from a location, or denied access to a location

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction|= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of king Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) who is also known as Uzziah (עֻזִּיָּה) ► he succeeded his father as king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= events that have taken place, that are not among a range of events that have been described or dealt with in a certain way; used for acts of kings only
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= man; ◄ son of Amoz (אָמֹוץ) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of prophet (נָבִיא) Isaiah (יְשַׁעְיָהוּ)
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

Node.gloss: to lie down with one's fathers > to rest with one's ancestors
Node.definition: literally: to lie down with one's fathers; hence: = process by which a human being dies and so shares the fate and destination of his/her ancestors; ≈ only said of people in positions demanding respect, such as patriarchs and kings
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple
= indirect male progenitor

= to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= indirect male progenitor

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another

= action by which the body of someone who died is laid down in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ not receiving a burial is considered a deep humiliation
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to suffer from a skin disease|to be affected by mildew
Node.definition: = state in which humans suffer from a condition that affects the skin, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= man; ◄ son of king Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) who is also known as Uzziah (עֻזִּיָּה) ► he succeeded his father as king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
